text:
Maybe, maybe not. 
I’ve three personal devices, all using an HP printer connected via cable to my
Router and each device using wifi to router to access the printer. I use the
router wifi, because the printer direct wifi can be, well somewhat ‘flaky’. 
Two devices on Win10 Pro, one on Win11 Pro…all fully updated, all with ‘Device
Installation Settings’ enabled. 
* No HP Smart on this device. 
Note: I do have another Win11 Pro device desktop at my other home that does
have the HP Smart App 
* Not installed by the method discussed in this thread, installed by me for
 quick info on printer info and a few other tools since I don’t install the
 full HP software, just the base driver.
%40BYAPR05MB6552.namprd05.prod.outlook.com
